Rich-
	A little late getting back to this, I uploaded pics of my Hachiwari 
which is a bit different from the bokuto Dragon we saw earlier. They 
are in the Toryu folder in the Nihonto group photos section on Yahoo 
groups. If you can't make your way there let me know and I'll send them 
to you off list,
Tom
